item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The April Restaurant of the month is Stella Blu.

About the Restaurant of the Month:
Stella Blu may have kept the same location and concept as the former Manhattan on Pearl, but its original menu and newly decorated-in-gold atmosphere proves that change can be a good thing.

The trendy restaurant offers tapas, which are small bites meant to be shared and eaten with drinks at a bar before proceeding to the full meal, but Stella Blu has figured out a way to make enjoying several different kinds of tapas from a variety of cultures, such as Little Italy, Asia Town, the Latin Quarter, and Main St. USA, a meal within itself.

http://www.nashuatele...

Menu:
http://www.stellablu-...

Directions:
http://www.mapquest.c...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
